<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Register numbers can represent physical registers, virtual registers, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sometimes stack slots. The unsigned values are divided into these ranges:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   0           Not a register, can be used as a sentinel.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#91;1;2^30)    Physical registers assigned by TableGen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#91;2^30;2^31) Stack slots. (Rarely used.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#91;2^31;2^32) Virtual registers assigned by MachineRegisterInfo.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Further sentinels can be allocated from the small negative integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DenseMapInfo&lt;unsigned&gt; uses -1u and -2u.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a003389e30c9b0ec678f95bad1f3dbc4a">::max</a>() &gt;= 0xFFFFFFFF,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Reg isn&#39;t large enough to hold full range.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
